name: WHAT ( bubbles )
description:
Begin a brain-bending, bubble-bursting bonanza! WHAT ( bubbles ) adds a new twist to bubble shooting games by combining classic color-matching gameplay with knocking out numbers to create a challenge that’s easy to learn, but nearly impossible to put down!

But with a little strategy, some clever tricks, and an occasional booster, you’re sure to break through!

**GAME FEATURES**

SIMPLE CONTROLS: Just drag your finger on the screen to aim, and let go to launch.

INNOVATIVE GAMEPLAY: Each bubble has a number, telling you how many hits it can take before going POP! In addition, your launcher fires a different number of bubbles each time, too, so you have to think carefully about where to send each bubble barrage.

ENDLESS ENJOYMENT: WHAT ( bubbles ) lets you start a new game fast, and as many times as you want with no waiting for energy or extra lives. So you can keep playing ‘til you burst!

CUSTOM THEMES: Unlock a variety of cool bubble skins and game themes as you play, so you can enjoy the action with your own unique style.

BUBBLE BOOSTER: Unleash a powerful Booster, which will give you an edge when things are getting tough.

POP TO THE TOP: Challenge the world and see how high you can climb on the global Leaderboards!

Pumped to play? Then pop to it!
